settings.api_key_help: Get the OpenAI API key from openai.com.
settings.base_uri_help: The base URI of the OpenAI API. Default is https://api.openai.com/v1.
settings.max_tokens_help: What are tokens and how to count them?
settings.user_prompt_help: Enter the user id that will be used to generate the answer. Default is who started the discussion.
settings.user_prompt_badge_help: Text that will be displayed next to the user prompt.
settings.role_help: Select the role that will be used to generate the answer.
settings.prompt_help: Enter the prompt that will be used to generate the answer. [title] variable should be kept constant.
settings.enable_on_discussion_started_help: The discussion will receive an answer based on content of first post when the discussion is started.
settings.enabled_tags_help: Select which tags will be used to generate the answer.
settings.answer_duration_help: Answer duration in minutes. Default is 5 minutes.
settings.enable_on_reply_help: Enable on reply if there is no answer
settings.continue_to_reply_help: Continue to reply if there is an answer
settings.continue_to_reply_count_help: How many times the bot will continue to reply. Default is 5.
settings.queue_active_help: When the queue is activated, the bot is added to the queue to respond.
settings.moderation_help: If moderation is enabled, the user cannot create a discussion or reply if it is contains inappropriate content.
settings.fetch_models_error: Failed to fetch models. Please check your API key and base URI settings.
settings.models_never_fetched: Models have never been fetched. Click the button above to fetch the latest models.
